channel.title: V4V Lightning Test Feed

item.title: Episode 1: Lightning Network Basics
item.description: Learn about Lightning Network and how to send payments to chad@getalby.com and alice@walletofsatoshi.com
item.content:encoded:
In this episode, we discuss Lightning Network basics and how to send payments to various Lightning addresses.

Lightning addresses: chad@getalby.com, alice@walletofsatoshi.com

Node pubkey: 02eec7245d6b7d2ccb30380bfbe2a3648cd7a942653f5aa340edcea1f283686619

item.title: Episode 2: Value for Value Podcasting
item.description: Exploring V4V podcasting with Lightning payments to bob@coinos.io and carol@zebedee.io
item.content:encoded:
This episode covers Value for Value podcasting and how creators can monetize their content.

Lightning addresses: bob@coinos.io, carol@zebedee.io

item.title: Episode 3: Bitcoin and Lightning Development
item.description: Technical deep dive into Bitcoin development with payments to dev@lightning.network
item.content:encoded:
